statements: DELETE FROM SupplierPerformanceReport WHERE report_id = 1 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM SupplierPerformanceReport WHERE performance_rating > 3 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM ratings WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND reviewer = 'John Doe';
